SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package UIPackage

Class BoardLogic

java.lang.Object
UIPackage.BoardLogic
public class BoardLogic extends Object
This class contains the core game logic for the HexOust board game. It manages the state of the game board, tracks player pieces, and handles game rules such as move validation and capture mechanics.

    • testMode

      public static boolean testMode

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardLogic

      public BoardLogic()

  • Method Details

    • checkGameWon

      public static boolean checkGameWon(boolean isRedTurn)
      Checks if the current player has won the game. A player wins when they have 2 or more hexagons and the opponent has none.
      Parameters:
      isRedTurn - true if it's Red player's turn, false if it's Blue player's turn
      Returns:
      true if the current player has won, false otherwise

    • addToList

      public static void addToList(UIPackage.HexCube c, boolean isRedTurn)
      Adds a hexagon to the current player's collection and checks for captures.
      Parameters:
      c - The HexCube coordinates to add
      isRedTurn - true if it's Red player's turn, false if it's Blue player's turn

    • isValidMove

      public static boolean isValidMove(UIPackage.HexCube c, boolean isRedTurn)
      Determines if placing a hexagon at the specified coordinates is a valid move. A move is valid if: 1. The hex position is not already occupied 2. The hex position is not adjacent to a hex of the same color, unless it's a capturing move
      Parameters:
      c - The hex coordinates to check
      isRedTurn - true if checking for Red player, false for Blue player
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise

    • printLists

      public static void printLists()
      Prints the current state of the board (red and blue hexagons) to standard output. Used primarily for debugging purposes.

    • listSize

      public static int listSize(boolean isRedTurn)
      Returns the number of hexagons owned by the opposing player.
      Parameters:
      isRedTurn - true if it's Red player's turn, false if it's Blue player's turn
      Returns:
      count of opponent's hexagons

    • repaintHexagons

      public static void repaintHexagons(UIPackage.HexCube c)
      Updates the UI to repaint a hexagon back to the base color. This is called when a hexagon is captured and needs to be visually removed.
      Parameters:
      c - The hex coordinates of the hexagon to repaint

    • removeDuplicates

      public static List<Integer> removeDuplicates(List<Integer> list)
      Removes duplicate values from a list of integers.
      Parameters:
      list - The list from which to remove duplicates
      Returns:
      A new list containing only unique values

    • clearBoard

      public static void clearBoard()
      Clears the board by removing all hexagons from both players. Used when resetting the game.
